question: What are the various features of mobile banking / Siddhartha BankSmart XP?
answer:
Siddhartha BankSmart XP offers a variety of services and other value added features will be incorporated in coming days. Some of the existing features are:
- Inquiries related to available balance, account statement, transaction history, interest rate, forex rate, transaction limit.

- ATM and Branch Locations

question: How can I register/activate the mobile banking / Siddhartha BankSmart XP service?
answer:
If you are an account holder of the Bank, you can register for BankSmart XP by visiting your nearest branch. Once you are registered, you will get an SMS alert of successful registration. For activation, you need to download the BankSmart XP app from Play store or App store. Click on “Register/Activate”, accept terms & conditions, enter your mobile number, accept the SMS charges, and activation code will be generated. Once you are redirected to native SMS app, click on send for completing the activation process (Make sure to use the same mobile number which was registered in the Bank). Get back to the application and enter the OTP. On validation of OTP, enter your account number, follow the guided steps to set login Password, transaction PIN, security question, email ID and start using the application.
Note: The process will be different for customer residing abroad.
You need to visit the nearest Siddhartha Bank’s agent. Once your user is created by agent, you need to download the BankSmart XP app from Play store or App Store. Click on “Register/Activate”, accept terms and conditions, enter your mobile number. You will get OTP on your registered email ID. Using the OTP, you can set your login Password and transaction PIN, security question and start using the application.

question: What to do if I forgot Password/PIN of mobile banking / Siddhartha BankSmart XP?
answer: If you forgot your password, click on “Forgot Password” button in the login page. Accept the applicable charges, enter your mobile number, accept the SMS charges, and an activation code will be generated. You will be redirected to native SMS app and send that message for verification (Make sure to use the same mobile number which was registered earlier). Once the code is validated, OTP will be received in the mobile number. Enter the OTP and submit, once it is validated, enter your account number, answer the security questions set by you while/after registration/activation. On verification of security questions and answers, you can set new log-in Password and transaction PIN. Alternatively, you can request for forgot password/pin visiting your nearest branch or agent (for international customer).

question: What is the difference between login Password and Transaction PIN?
answer: Login Password is the password to login with GPRS Mode. Upon login if you wish to execute any financial service such as Fund Transfer, TopUps etc, you need to use your transaction PIN for completing the transaction in GPRS Mode. Likewise, if you are using SMS mode, you need to input transaction PIN for every request. However, if you are using Web, login Password is used to login the application and to perform the transaction thereafter, you will receive OTP in your registered mobile number and email ID.

question: What is the detailed process of using Cardless Withdrawal?
answer:
1. Please login into Banksmart XP and select menu "Cardless Withdrawal" under menu "Payment" or search "Cardless Withdrawal" from search option in Main page.
2. Please select the amount from dropdown and click "Proceed".
3. Please enter the transaction PIN, upon authentication.
4. An OTP will be sent via SMS which will expire in 5 Minutes.
5. Please select option "Cardless" from the SBL ATM screen for further processing.
6. ATM will ask for your “Mobile number”. Enter the same mobile number which is registered in BankSmart XP.
7. Upon validation of Mobile Number ATM will ask for “OTP”.
8. Please input the “OTP” received via SMS.
9. Upon validation of “OTP”, ATM will ask for Amount,
10. Please input the same amount for which cardless withdrawal was requested through Banksmart XP.
11. Upon validation, customer account will be debited and ATM will dispense the cash.

question: What is a Cash Deposit Machine?
answer: A Cash Deposit Machine (CDM) is an electronic device that enables users to deposit cash into their Bank accounts without having to interact with the Bank Teller. The machine accepts cash for denominations of NPR 1,000 and NPR 500 only. The machine will count cash automatically and identify any counterfeit and damaged notes without any manual intervention. The deposited funds are then credited to the User's bank account in real-time.

question: What is the detailed process of using Cash Deposit Machine?
answer:
1. Select the "Deposit" option on the Cash Deposit screen to start the deposit process.
2. Cash Deposit Machine (CDM) will request for Mobile Number of cash depositor for authentication where an OTP will be sent to provide mobile number.
3. Please Input 6-digit OTP received in SMS and upon successful OT validation and input the Depositing account number and press "Continue" option.
4. CDM will display the account details in screen and please verify the account details and press "Continue" option for further processing. The deposit cash should not exceed NPR 99,500 at one time.
5. Place the cash in the hopper, CDM will count notes to hold in stack and display the amount for those notes which can be accepted for deposit. However, notes that are Counterfeit, Damaged and Folded will be presented back immediately.
6. Counterfeit and Damaged will never be accepted for deposit however for Folded notes, please unfold the notes and reattempt to deposit by pressing “Continue" option. CDM will recheck those notes and display the final count in screen.
7. Please press "Confirm" option if the displayed amount is correct.
8. CDM will generate and present a slip to which contains information regarding Failed/Success Status, Note Counts, Deposited Amount and Unique ID number.
9. In case CDM is not able to execute accounting entry for deposit due to various dependencies like Network, API Breakage, CBS Down etc. please contact the Bank’s staff.

question: What is SBL Debit Card?
answer: SBL Debit Card is a plastic card which has access to the bank account at any time. SBL Visa Debit Card can be used in merchant locations that have Point-of-Sale (POS) Terminals for purchases and Automated Teller Machines (ATMs) to withdraw cash. The card is authenticated by PIN (Personal Identification Number).

question: If I try to withdraw cash from SBL ATM and the machine did not dispense cash whereas my account has been debited. In such case what should I do to get my money back?
answer:
Please register a written complaint to your nearest branch with the following details:
- Card No.
- Account No.
- Name
- Transaction amount
- Transaction date
- Transaction no. (Retrieval Reference No.) – Optional
- Bank Name – Optional
- ATM ID – Optional
- Transaction slips receipt from the ATM – Optional
We will reimburse the amount to your account after verification of your claim. It will take about 3 working days if it is the case of withdrawal from SBL ATM. If it is the case of withdrawal from other bank’s ATM, it will take at least 45 days.

question: What is SBL Credit Card?

question: How can I register/activate the mobile banking / Siddhartha BankSmart XP service?
answer: If you’re an account holder, visit your nearest Siddhartha Bank branch to register for BankSmart XP. After registration, you’ll receive an SMS confirming success. To activate, download the BankSmart XP app from the Play Store or App Store, click 'Register/Activate,' accept the terms, enter your registered mobile number, agree to SMS charges, and receive an activation code. Send the code via your SMS app (using the registered number), return to the app, input the OTP received, enter your account number, set a login password, transaction PIN, security question, and email ID to start using it. For customers abroad, visit a Siddhartha Bank agent to register, then follow the same app activation steps, receiving the OTP via email instead.

question: How do I transfer money using mobile banking?
answer: To transfer money using Siddhartha BankSmart XP, follow these steps: 1. Download and install the Siddhartha BankSmart XP app from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store. 2. Log in using your registered credentials (username and password or biometric login if enabled). If you’re a new user, register by selecting 'Register/Activate,' entering your mobile number (linked to your account), and following the OTP verification process. 3. Once logged in, go to the 'Fund Transfer' section from the main menu. 4. Select the type of transfer: 'Within Siddhartha Bank' for internal transfers or 'Fonepay Network' for transfers to other banks. 5. Enter the recipient’s account details (account number for internal transfers or mobile number/email for Fonepay transfers). 6. Input the amount and add a remark if needed. 7. Confirm the transaction with your transaction PIN or OTP (sent to your registered mobile number). 8. Review the confirmation message for a successful transfer. Note: Ensure your account has sufficient funds and is enrolled for full financial transactions (visit a branch if self-registered with minimal limits). For assistance, contact Siddhartha Care at 01-5970020.

question: How do I transfer money to another bank using Siddhartha Bank mobile banking?
answer: To transfer money to another bank using Siddhartha BankSmart XP, follow these steps: 1. Open the Siddhartha BankSmart XP app and log in with your credentials. 2. Navigate to the 'Fund Transfer' option in the menu. 3. Choose 'Fonepay Network' for interbank transfers (Siddhartha Bank supports Fonepay for external transfers). 4. Enter the recipient’s mobile number or email linked to their Fonepay account, or select their bank and input their account number if prompted. 5. You’ll receive a confirmation once the transfer is complete. Note: Daily transfer limits may apply (e.g., NPR 200,000 via iConnect; check in-app for BankSmart XP limits). Contact 01-5970020 for support if needed.

question: How do I set up mobile banking to transfer money with Siddhartha Bank?
answer: To set up Siddhartha BankSmart XP for money transfers, follow these steps: 1. Download the Siddhartha BankSmart XP app from the Google Play Store or App Store. 2. Open the app and click 'Register/Activate.' 3. Accept the terms and conditions, then enter your mobile number (must match the one registered with your Siddhartha Bank account). 4. Agree to SMS charges; an activation code will be sent via SMS. 5. Send the code as instructed, then return to the app and enter the OTP received. 6. Provide your account number, set a login password, transaction PIN, security question, and email ID. 7. Once activated, log in and test a small transfer via 'Fund Transfer' to confirm setup. Note: Self-registration offers limited financial roles; visit a branch for full access. Contact 01-5970020 for assistance.
